front.title: Software Inventory Message and Attributes (SWIMA) for PA-TNC

abstract.t: This document extends "PA-TNC: A Posture Attribute (PA) Protocol Compatible with Truste Network Connect (TNC) (RFC 5792) by providing specific attributes and message exchanges to allow endpoints to report their installed software inventory information to a NEA server, as defined in "Network Endpoint Assessment (NEA): Overview and Requirements" (RFC 5209).
